name: AVPictureInPictureControllerDelegate
desc: A protocol to adopt to respond to Picture in Picture events.

items.name: func pictureInPictureController(AVPictureInPictureController, restoreUserInterfaceForPictureInPictureStopWithCompletionHandler: (Bool) -> Void)
items.desc: Tells the delegate to restore the user interface before Picture in Picture stops.

items.name: func pictureInPictureControllerWillStartPictureInPicture(AVPictureInPictureController)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that Picture in Picture is about to start.

items.name: func pictureInPictureControllerDidStartPictureInPicture(AVPictureInPictureController)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that Picture in Picture started.

items.name: func pictureInPictureController(AVPictureInPictureController, failedToStartPictureInPictureWithError: Error)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that Picture in Picture failed to start.

items.name: func pictureInPictureControllerWillStopPictureInPicture(AVPictureInPictureController)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that Picture in Picture is about to stop.

items.name: func pictureInPictureControllerDidStopPictureInPicture(AVPictureInPictureController)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that Picture in Picture stopped.
